comments: TA to activate option year 1. End date novembre 2015. IT Consultant primalry working on SII, Termium 6 and Termium Plus. This contract was transfered to CIOB in august 2014. For a contract with task authorizations, the realized amount of the contract is contingent on the number of task authorizations issued and may be less than the amount proactively disclosed, dependent on the operational requirements of the department. This contract is a multi-year contract. This contract is a call-up against a Public Works and Government Services Canada procurement tool.
